Container.Name: PMDA
Container.Overview: PMDA: Plex Music DeDupe Assistant – detect and clean duplicate albums in your Plex music library with optional AI assistance.

Config.Name: Plex Host URL
Config.Description: Base URL of your Plex server (include port).

Config.Name: Music Section ID
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Comma-separated list of Plex music library section IDs. Leave empty to auto-detect all music libraries (recommended).

Config.Name: Default Mode (serve / cli)
Config.Description: Set ‘serve’ for Web UI, ‘cli’ for command-line.

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: Leave blank to disable AI assistance.

Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Enter your Discord webhook to receive dedupe reports and stats directly in your server.

Config.Name: Use MusicBrainz API
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Set to true to use MusicBrainz lookups during scans. Slows down processing!!!

Config.Name: Cross-Library Comparison
Config.Description: Set to true to detect duplicates across all music libraries, or false to dedupe within each library independently.

Config.Name: Skip Folders
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Comma-separated list of folder paths to exclude from scans (e.g. '/music/Trash').

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Set logging verbosity: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING or ERROR.

Config.Name: Scan Threads
Config.Description: Number of parallel threads used during scanning.

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Holds PMDA config.json, state.db and cache.db.

Config.Name: Parent Music Folder
Config.Description: Parent folder containing all your music libraries. PMDA will auto-discover subfolders on first run.

Config.Name: Dupe Output
Config.Description: Folder where PMDA will move duplicates if configured to do so.

Config.Name: PLEX_DB_PATH
Config.Description: (Advanced) DO NOT CHANGE THIS. Used internally to locate Plex's database.

Config.Name: PMDA_CONFIG_DIR
Config.Description: (Advanced) DO NOT CHANGE THIS. Used internally to store configuration and scan state.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Host port mapped to container's Web UI (http://[IP]:[PORT]/).
